entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ListView.SelectedItem retains its value after item is removed from ListView or ListView is cleared #16053
  • Set up an Azure Devops image with maui pre-installed, as this would reduce CI times for most users significantly #16052
  • Scrollview pushes button below beyond the screen on iOS #16051
  • [WinUI] Styles from a `ResourceDictionary` do not work on WinUI #16050
  • [WinUI] No way to change the `TextColor` for the `Switch` control #16047

Closed

  • Page title won't update when switching tabs with top bars inside a TabBar inside a shell on Android. Re-introduced #11549
    Backlog
  • [Android] Button Corner Radius is broken with high BorderWidth values #12056
    Backlog
  • Building AdHoc iOS in Release does not ask for permissions on device #16034

PullRequests

Created

  • [Bug] Fixes content sizing issue found on ios for the ScrollView #16048
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • Make Add/Remove Logical public #16046

Updated

  • Fix iOS picker placeholder text overrided (#15139) #15198
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [android] fix memory leak in Window #16045
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [android] improve performance of Shell flyout opening #15733
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16033
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
